title: Notice by liquidator of his appointment.
content: 288.- (1) The liquidator shall, within fourteen days after his appointment, publish in the Gazette and deliver to the registrar of companies for registration a notice of his appointment in the prescribed form. 4 of 166 of 1987. (2) If the liquidator fails to comply with the requirements of this section he shall be liable to a fine not exceeding forty-two euros for every day during which the default continues. Arrangement when binding on creditors.
